function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Creation of cultures and societies of transition","Impact":"Potential increase in interconnectedness and spread of contagious diseases due to societal transition","Mitigation":"Implementation of public health education and awareness programs, promotion of personal hygiene and vaccination","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, contact tracing technologies","People":"General population, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Role of cities in creating the climate crisis","Impact":"Increased urban population density leading to higher risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Urban planning strategies for better sanitation, healthcare infrastructure development","Technologies":"Smart city technology for disease monitoring, urban design for better ventilation and sunlight exposure","People":"Urban residents, city planners, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Local government, urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Long-lasting buildings as human artefacts","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and ventilation leading to increased risk of respiratory infections","Mitigation":"Building design for better ventilation and air circulation, use of air purification systems","Technologies":"Building management systems, air quality monitoring devices","People":"Building occupants, construction workers","Owner":"Building owners, construction companies"}]}
